entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
